mapper.select: select a.dailylogno ,a.deptcode ,a.workerid ,b.username ,a.workingday ,a.part ,content1 ,content2 ,content3 ,content4 ,overtimestart ,overtimeend ,overtimecontent ,tag from t_dailylog a inner join t_user b on a.workerid = b.userid where 1=1 and workingday =#{dailylog.workingday} and a.deptcode =#{dailylog.deptcode} order by positioncode, workerid

with dailylog_table as ( select a.dailylogno ,a.deptcode ,a.workerid ,b.username ,a.workingday ,b.positioncode ,b.userid from t_dailylog a inner join t_user b on a.workerid = b.userid where 1=1 and workingday between #{startdate} and #{enddate} and a.deptcode = #{deptcode} order by positioncode, workerid ) select workingday, listagg(username, ',') within group (order by positioncode) as username, deptcode from dailylog_table group by workingday, deptcode
